name: Reset Password Removed
author: Shovon

sections.description:
Easily enhance the security of your WordPress site by removing the ability for non-admin users to change or reset their passwords. The “Reset Password Removed” plugin ensures that only administrators have the power to modify password settings, reducing the risk of unauthorized access.

Key Features:

  • Restrict Password Resets: Prevents non-admin users from resetting their passwords, adding an extra layer of security to your site.
  • Admin Control: Keeps password management accessible only to site administrators, ensuring critical access remains in trusted hands.
  • Streamlined User Experience: Automatically removes the “Lost your password?” link from the login page for non-admin users.
  • Lightweight & Efficient: The plugin is built to be lightweight, ensuring it doesn’t slow down your website.

Why Choose Reset Password Removed?

If you’re looking to enhance your WordPress security without complicating user management, this plugin is the perfect solution. Ideal for websites where password security is paramount, it simplifies control and prevents potential vulnerabilities from password resets.

Compatible with: WordPress 6.x and PHP 7.4+
sections.installation:
1. Go to your wp-admin panel.
  2. Click Add new plugin.
  3. Click browse and select this plugin from your desktop.
  4. Click Install Now.
  5. Active this plugin.
sections.faq:
What if I forgot my password?

You should reset it through phpmyadmin.

Is this definitive protection?

Certainly not. It will rather set off script kiddies.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Compatible with the latest version of WordPress.

1.0

First version with basic functionalities.
